attributes.action: Take appropraite action against those responsible for the lack of care of the childcare services in Haringey.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to raise this petition to force the government to dismiss those on the child services for Haringey responsible for the small boy that died there last August.  This is a replica of the Victoria Climbie case, and those in charge of Haringey should be held equally responsible for not adhering to the rules brought about by the aforementioned case.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
